290405.「立派に 村を復興されたこと\n 私も うれしく 思っています。:
I'm so happy to see that you've restored
your village.

290406.「ふたり分の人生を 背負い\n その重圧に 負けることなく\n 歩みを止めずにい:
I admire you for carrying the weight of two
lives on your shoulders and not letting it
stop you from moving forward.

290407.「この世に 生を取りもどしたあと\n 多くの人々を 救っていく様子は\n 目が:
It was fascinating to watch you save so many
people after you came back to this world.

290408.「あなたが 無事 冥獣王を打ち破り\n アストルティアを救ってくれたこと\n 誇:
I am proud of you for successfully defeating
the Beast Lord and saving Astoltia.

290409.「勇者と盟友。その関係は この先の世代でも\n くり返されるのでしょうか。:
Hero and allies. Will this relationship be
repeated in future generations?

290410.「物語の中の人物を 再現してしまうなど\n 大魔王マデサゴーラは いったい何を\:
What in the world was the Great Demon King
Madesagora thinking when he re-created the
characters in the story?

290411.「あなたの行動のおかげで 遺された人たちは\n 亡くなった子どもたちと 再会を果:
Thanks to your actions, the survivors have
been reunited with their deceased children and
the emotional scars seem to be fading.

290412.「人となった魔物が 何を考えて\n どのような 気持ちでいるのか\n 一度 会っ:
I would like to meet and talk with them once
to find out what they are thinking and
feeling.

290413.「大魔王マデサゴーラを討ち倒し\n アストルティアに 平和をもたらしてくれたこと:
We are very grateful to you for defeating the
Great Demon King Madesagora and bringing peace
to Astoltia.

294233.まだ その思い出の場所には 行けないようだ。: You can't go to that Memory Location yet.
